Package fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc

Dynamic remote component creation and connection for component assemblies.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DynamicallyConnectableComponentI
    The interface DynamicallyConnectableI defines a component service to connect some of its port to another component at run-time.
    DynamicallyConnectableI
    The interface DynamicallyConnectableI defines the component methods implementing the dynamic connection service.
    DynamicComponentCreationI
    The interface DynamicComponentCreationI defines the component creation service offered and required interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DynamicallyConnectableComponentConnector
    The class DynamicallyConnectableComponentConnector connects a component requiring the dynamic component connection service from another component offering it.
    DynamicallyConnectableComponentInboundPort
    The class DynamicallyConnectableComponentInboundPort reifies the DynamicallyConnectableComponentI offered interface for a component and connects it to the requiring component through a DynamicallyConnectableComponentConnector connector.
    DynamicallyConnectableComponentOutboundPort
    The class DynamicallyConnectableComponentOutboundPort reifies the DynamicallyConnectableComponentI required interface for a component and connects it to the offering component through a DynamicallyConnectableComponentConnector connector.
    DynamicComponentCreationConnector
    The class DynamicComponentCreationConnector implements a connector between components requiring DynamicComponentCreationI and a component DynamicComponentCreator.
    DynamicComponentCreationInboundPort
    The class DynamicComponentCreationInboundPort implements the inbound port of a DynamicCOmponentCreator component.
    DynamicComponentCreationOutboundPort
    The class DynamicComponentCreationOutboundPort implements the outbound port of a DynamicCOmponentCreator client component.
    DynamicComponentCreator
    The class DynamicComponentCreator defines components that will be automatically added in each of the sites of a distributed component assembly to allow for the dynamic remote creation of components on the virtual where the component is running.

Package fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc Description

Dynamic remote component creation and connection for component assemblies.

This package introduces predefined components DynamicComponentCreator automatically added to each instance of assemblies to provide for a dynamic and remote component creation service. The basic idea is that each instance of the assembly on each virtual machine has a copy of such a component that offers the interface DynamicComponentCreationI. The URI of the inbound port through which the service is offered is created from the URI of the JVM suffixed by "-dcc". A component that want to create another component on a remote JVM has to create an outbound port DynamicComponentCreationOutboundPort, connect it to the inbound port of the dynamic component creator running on the remote virtual machine, and call the service createComponent with the appropriate parameters.

A complementary service is provided by the package: tha capability to make a component execute an connection with another component. As the connection logic offered by the ConnectionBuilder assumes that the connection is made by a component local to the virtual machine where the ConnectionBuilder code is executed with another component that can be remote, a third party component asking for the creation of a component on a remote JVM cannot itself connect this component to another one. Hence, a DynamicallyConnectableComponentI interface defines the necessary service to be called on a component C to connect a port of C to a port of another component.
